release.action: Added documentation on how to configure the plugin.
Enable build on multiple Flex SDK platforms (current flex2 and flex3)
Generating HTML wrapper files from a Flex HTML template, and deploying them to a web application
Moved dependencies from project level to plugin level
Enable asdoc build, to generate developer documents
Enable compc build, to build Flex .swc file (component library)
Enable mxmlc build, to build Flex .swf file with auto dependency resolution
Setup default directory layout for Maven project when initializing
Extended Flex build lifecycles (swf and swc)
